statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (7,-4) and (2,12).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{12}-{\left(-{4}\right)}}}{{{2}-{\left({7}\right)}}}=\frac{{16}}{{-{{5}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-\frac{{16}}{{5}} (if it's not already reduced)
